charges.charge_description: POSSESSION W/INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE CRACK COCAINE (CRIMINAL FORFEITURE)(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Life imprisonment, 10 yrs supervised release CC, $100 special assessment. AMD JGMT 11/30/07 - 168 mos imprisonment CC, 5 yrs supervised release CC, $100 special assessment. AMD JGMT 12/27/07 - correction of sentence for clerical mistake to correct the total mos of imprisonment from 168 to 228. SENTENCE REDUCED 2/5/09 - 135 months imprisonment. SENTENCE REDUCED 11/7/11 - 120 months imprisonment.

AMD JGMT 12/27/07 - correction of sentence for clerical mistake to correct the total mos of imprisonment from 168 to 228.

charges.charge_description: POSSESSION OF FIREARM IN FURTHERANCE OF A DRUG TRAFFICKING CRIME (CRIMINAL FORFEITURE)(3s)

charges.charge_disposition: 60 mos imprisonment CS, 5 yrs supervised release CC, $100 special assessment.
